channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-28573] Unable to execute HPLSQl queries when hive authorization is enabled.
item.description:
Unable to execute HPLSQl queries when hive authorization is enabled.

Below exception is present in the HS2 logs

ERROR [HiveServer2-Background-Pool: Thread-886] hplsql.HplSqlOperation: Error running hive query
org.apache.hive.service.cli.HiveSQLException: Error running HPL/SQL operation
    at org.apache.hive.service.cli.operation.hplsql.HplSqlOperation.interpret(HplSqlOperation.java:111) ~[hive-service-4.1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:4.1.0-SNAPSHOT]
    at org.apache.hive.service.cli.operation.hplsql.HplSqlOperation.access$500(HplSqlOperation.java:54) ~[hive-service-4.1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:4.1.0-SNAPSHOT]
    at org.apache.hive.service.cli.operation.hplsql.HplSqlOperation$BackgroundWork.lambda$run$0(HplSqlOperation.java:207) ~[hive-service-4.1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:4.1.0-SNAPSHOT]
    at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) ~[?:1.8.0_292]
.
.
.
Caused by: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Cannot modify QUERY_EXECUTOR at runtime. It is not in list of params that are allowed to be modified at runtime
    at org.apache.hadoop.hive.conf.HiveConf.verifyAndSet(HiveConf.java:6075) ~[hive-common-4.1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:4.1.0-SNAPSHOT]
    at org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.QueryState$Builder.build(QueryState.java:342) ~[hive-exec-4.1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:4.1.0-SNAPSHOT]
    at org.apache.hive.service.cli.operation.Operation.<init>(Operation.java:112) ~[hive-service-4.1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:4.1.0-SNAPSHOT]
    at org.apache.hive.service.cli.operation.ExecuteStatementOperation.<init>(ExecuteStatementOperation.java:56) ~[hive-service-4.1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:4.1.0-SNAPSHOT]
    at org.apache.hive.service.cli.operation.SQLOperation.<init>(SQLOperation.java:118) ~[hive-service-4.1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:4.1.0-SNAPSHOT]
    at org.apache.hive.service.cli.operation.ExecuteStatementOperation.newExecuteStatementOperation(ExecuteStatementOperation.java:96) ~[hive-service-4.1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:4.1.0-SNAPSHOT]
    at org.apache.hive.service.cli.operation.OperationManager.newExecuteStatementOperation(OperationManager.java:111) ~[hive-service-4.1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:4.1.0-SNAPSHOT]
    at org.apache.hive.service.cli.session.HiveSessionImpl.executeStatementInternal(HiveSessionImpl.java:554) ~[hive-service-4.1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:4.1.0-SNAPSHOT]
    at org.apache.hive.service.cli.session.HiveSessionImpl.executeStatement(HiveSessionImpl.java:526) ~[hive-service-4.1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:4.1.0-SNAPSHOT]
    at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method) ~[?:1.8.0_292]
    at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:62) ~[?:1.8.0_292]
    at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43) ~[?:1.8.0_292]
    at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:498) ~[?:1.8.0_292]
    at org.apache.hive.service.cli.session.HiveSessionProxy.invoke(HiveSessionProxy.java:78) ~[hive-service-4.1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:4.1.0-SNAPSHOT]
    at org.apache.hive.service.cli.session.HiveSessionProxy.access$000(HiveSessionProxy.java:36) ~[hive-service-4.1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:4.1.0-SNAPSHOT]

    at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) ~[?:1.8.0_292]
    at javax.security.auth.Subject.doAs(Subject.java:422) ~[?:1.8.0_292]
    at org.apache.hadoop.security.UserGroupInformation.doAs(UserGroupInformation.java:1899) ~[hadoop-common-3.3.6.jar:?]
    at org.apache.hive.service.cli.session.HiveSessionProxy.invoke(HiveSessionProxy.java:59) ~[hive-service-4.1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:4.1.0-SNAPSHOT]
    at com.sun.proxy.$Proxy126.executeStatement(Unknown Source) ~[?:?]
    at org.apache.hive.service.cli.operation.hplsql.HplSqlQueryExecutor.executeQuery(HplSqlQueryExecutor.java:68) ~[hive-service-4.1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:4.1.0-SNAPSHOT]

    at org.apache.hive.hplsql.HplsqlBaseVisitor.visitBlock(HplsqlBaseVisitor.java:27) ~[hive-hplsql-4.1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:4.1.0-SNAPSHOT]

    at org.antlr.v4.runtime.tree.AbstractParseTreeVisitor.visitChildren(AbstractParseTreeVisitor.java:46) ~[antlr4-runtime-4.9.3.jar:4.9.3]

    at org.antlr.v4.runtime.tree.AbstractParseTreeVisitor.visit(AbstractParseTreeVisitor.java:18) ~[antlr4-runtime-4.9.3.jar:4.9.3]
    at org.apache.hive.hplsql.Exec.evaluate(Exec.java:817) ~[hive-hplsql-4.1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:4.1.0-SNAPSHOT]

item.summary: Unable to execute HPLSQl queries when hive authorization is enabled.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Merged to master. Thanks Dayakar for the patch and difin for the review.
